caseTitle: Haroon-ur-Rasheed v. Chairman Lahore Development Authority & another
tagline: The remedy of appeal before the Punjab Service Tribunal against any order passed under Ss. 16 & 17 of the Punjab Employees Efficiency, Discipline and Accountability Act, 2006 could only be invoked and availed by the employees falling within the ambit of S. 2(h)(ii) of the said Act and not by employees of statutory corporation/authority/body etc. falling under S. 2(h)(i) of the said Act. Employees of a statutory corporation/authority/body proceeded against under statutory rules or any statutory dispensation could challenge action of the competent authority under Article 199 of the Constitution of Pakistan.
